title: The default value in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying it.
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying it.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report.
2. Locate the list box of the report parameter.
3. Set a default value for the list box (e.g., 'aaa').
4. Modify the default value to a different value.
5. Check the behavior of the list box.

OB: 

EB: The default value ('aaa') should still be displayed after modifying it.
SR: 
1. Open the report.
2. Locate the list box of the report parameter.
3. Set a default value for the list box (e.g., 'aaa').
4. Modify the default value to a different value.
5. Verify that the default value is still displayed in the list box.
6. Click the OK button and confirm that it remains grayed out.
